messages.msgSnippet: A W E S O ME !!!!! Thankyou so much - you have no idea how much you made my day! And the Andrew sisters? I love them!  The copy my uncle had was by a man, I
messages.messageBody:
A W E S O ME !!!!!
Thankyou so much - you have no idea how much you made my day!
And the Andrew sisters? I love them! The copy my uncle had was by a man,
I had no idea the Andrew sisters did that one! You wouldn't happen to know where
I could get a copy of their songs (now, I'm not sure of the title, I'm working from a
little girls' memory) "Beat me Daddy, Eight to the Bar" and "Rum and Coca-Cola"
would you?

signed greedy,

Sessuale
